mapper.sql: pgs_id, user_id, year_scope, date1, award1, unit1, date2, award2, unit2, date3, award3, unit3, date4, award4, unit4, apply_reason, recommend_reason
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from pgs
order by ${orderByClause}

select pgs.yearScope te,major.name major,class_num.num classNum,user_basic.username username, user_basic.sex sex,user_basic.birth birth,user_basic.account account,user_basic.nation nation, user_basic.entrance entrance,user_basic.political political,user_basic.phone phone,user_basic.identity identity, user_info.gp gpRank,user_info.ce ceRank,major.sum majorSum,user_info.pass_sum passSum,user_info.class_sum classSum, pgs.date1 date1,pgs.award1 award1,pgs.unit1 unit1,pgs.date2 date2,pgs.award2 award2,pgs.unit2 unit2,pgs.date3 date3, pgs.award3 award3,pgs.unit3 unit3,pgs.date4 date4,pgs.award4 award4,pgs.unit4 unit4,pgs.apply_reason applyReason, pgs.recommend_reason recommendReason,opinion.pgs_opinion opinion from manager,pgs,major,class_num,user_basic,user_info,opinion where pgs.user_id = user_basic.user_id and pgs.year_scope = #{yearScope} and major.major_id = class_num.major_id and class_num.class_num_id = user_basic.class_num_id and user_basic.user_id = #{userId} and user_info.user_id = user_basic.user_id and user_info.year_scope = #{yearScope} and opinion.manager_id = manager.manager_id and manager.school_id = major.school_id and manager.grade = major.grade
mapper.insert: insert into pgs (pgs_id, user_id, year_scope, date1, award1, unit1, date2, award2, unit2, date3, award3, unit3, date4, award4, unit4, apply_reason, recommend_reason) values (#{pgsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{yearScope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{award1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{award2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{award3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{award4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommendReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into pgs
pgs_id,
user_id,
year_scope,
date1,
award1,
unit1,
date2,
award2,
unit2,
date3,
award3,
unit3,
date4,
award4,
unit4,
apply_reason,
recommend_reason,
#{pgsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{yearScope,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{date1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{award1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{date2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{award2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unit2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{date3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{award3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unit3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{date4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{award4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unit4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recommendReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update pgs
pgs_id = #{record.pgsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
year_scope = #{record.yearScope,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date1 = #{record.date1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award1 = #{record.award1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit1 = #{record.unit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date2 = #{record.date2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award2 = #{record.award2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit2 = #{record.unit2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date3 = #{record.date3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award3 = #{record.award3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit3 = #{record.unit3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date4 = #{record.date4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award4 = #{record.award4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit4 = #{record.unit4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_reason = #{record.applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend_reason = #{record.recommendReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update pgs set pgs_id = #{record.pgsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, year_scope = #{record.yearScope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date1 = #{record.date1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award1 = #{record.award1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit1 = #{record.unit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date2 = #{record.date2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award2 = #{record.award2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit2 = #{record.unit2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date3 = #{record.date3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award3 = #{record.award3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit3 = #{record.unit3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date4 = #{record.date4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award4 = #{record.award4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit4 = #{record.unit4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_reason = #{record.applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend_reason = #{record.recommendReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pgs
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
year_scope = #{yearScope,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date1 = #{date1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award1 = #{award1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit1 = #{unit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date2 = #{date2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award2 = #{award2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit2 = #{unit2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date3 = #{date3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award3 = #{award3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit3 = #{unit3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date4 = #{date4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award4 = #{award4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit4 = #{unit4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_reason = #{applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend_reason = #{recommendReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pgs_id = #{pgsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pgs set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, year_scope = #{yearScope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date1 = #{date1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award1 = #{award1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit1 = #{unit1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date2 = #{date2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award2 = #{award2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit2 = #{unit2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date3 = #{date3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award3 = #{award3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit3 = #{unit3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date4 = #{date4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, award4 = #{award4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit4 = #{unit4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_reason = #{applyReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend_reason = #{recommendReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pgs_id = #{pgsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
